entry.title: Japan Decides 'Tourism Pollution' Is Worth It as Money Floods In
entry.content: After a pandemic timeout, the nation recommits to being top visitor destination.

entry.title: Noises Detected in Hunt for Missing Titanic Submersible
entry.content: Despite the signs of hope from the tapping sounds, search experts sounded a note of pessimism over the likelihood of finding the crew alive, given the complications of locating the vessel and raising it.

entry.title: In Shattered Mariupol, Russia Uses a Theater to Legitimize Its Occupation
entry.content: Vladimir Putinâ€™s Russia is using claims about the Russian language and culture to justify its invasion.
